trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint that is pre-configured for discovery operations over a UDP multicast binding.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto de extremidade padrão pré-configurado para operações de descoberta por meio de uma associação multicast UDP.

trans-unit.source: This endpoint inherits from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint" /> and similarly has a fixed contract and supports two WS-Discovery protocol versions.
trans-unit.target: Esse ponto de extremidade herda de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint" /> e, da mesma forma, tem um contrato fixo e oferece suporte a duas versões do protocolo WS-Discovery.

trans-unit.source: In addition, it has a fixed UDP binding and a default address as specified in the WS-Discovery specifications (WS-Discovery April 2005 or WS-Discovery V1.1).
trans-unit.target: Além disso, ele tem uma associação de UDP fixa e um endereço padrão, conforme as especificações do WS-Discovery (WS-Discovery de abril de 2005 ou WS-Discovery V1.1).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> com o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente há suporte para as duas versões do protocolo WS-Discovery: WS-Discovery de abril de 2005 e WS-Discovery 1.1, que correspondem do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address.
trans-unit.target: O endereço multicast.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> class with the specified multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> com o endereço multicast especificado.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address.
trans-unit.target: O endereço multicast.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> class with the specified multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> com o endereço multicast especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address for the UDP discovery endpoint.
trans-unit.target: O endereço de multicast para o ponto de extremidade de descoberta de UDP.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> and multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> com o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> e o endereço multicast especificado.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente há suporte para as duas versões do protocolo WS-Discovery: WS-Discovery de abril de 2005 e WS-Discovery 1.1, que correspondem do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> com o endereço de multicast.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> and multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" /> com o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> e o endereço multicast especificado.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente há suporte para as duas versões do protocolo WS-Discovery: WS-Discovery de abril de 2005 e WS-Discovery 1.1, que correspondem do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default UDP multicast address for IPv4.
trans-unit.target: O endereço multicast UDP padrão para IPv4.

trans-unit.source: The default UDP multicast address for IPv6.
trans-unit.target: O endereço multicast UDP padrão para IPv6.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o endereço multicast.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance that contains the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instância que contém o endereço de multicast.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings" /> instance associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings" /> associada ao <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The UDP transport settings for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: As configurações de transporte UDP para o ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings> to change UDP transport settings for the UDP endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings> para alterar as configurações de transporte UDP para o ponto de extremidade UDP.
